type.description: The type of the item. Always `custom_tool_call`.

id.description: The unique ID of the custom tool call item.

call_id.description: The unique ID of the custom tool call that was generated.

name.description: The name of the custom tool that was called.

input.description: The input string that was generated for the tool.

status.description: The status of the custom tool call item that was recorded.

created_by.description: The identifier of the actor that created the item.

title: Custom tool call
description: A custom tool call that was generated by the model.
